screens.notes: Dashboard: conversations, leads, viewings, response time. Conversation logs, knowledge base management, brand settings, CRM integrations, analytics funnel.

screens.name: Landing / Marketing

screens.name: Auth (Sign Up / Sign In)
screens.notes: Auth card: email/password, social auth (Google, Apple), password strength indicator, forgot password, terms checkbox, error alerts.

screens.name: Onboarding Intake
screens.notes: 6-step wizard: goals (multi-select chips), experience level (3 cards), equipment (visual checklist), schedule (day toggles + duration slider), injuries (interactive body map), pillar preferences (30 chips). Skip option.

screens.name: AI Workout Generator
screens.notes: THE CORE SCREEN. Chat interface with output panel. States: default, chat, generating, workout_ready, modifying, limit_reached. Quick chips, exercise rows with swap, generation counter badge.

screens.name: Active Workout Mode
screens.notes: Full-screen workout. Exercise video player (YouTube), set logger (weight/reps/RPE), rest timer, progress bar, exercise queue list, form cues card, swap button. Modals for end early, exercise swap, PR celebration, notes.

screens.name: Exercise Library
screens.notes: Sidebar filters + content grid. Muscle group body map, equipment filter, pillar filter, movement pattern filter, difficulty filter. Exercise cards with video thumbnail, name, muscle badges, difficulty badge.

screens.name: Exercise Detail
screens.notes: Video player, muscle map, attribute badges, form cues, step-by-step instructions, progression/regression chain (timeline), variations grid.

screens.name: Dashboard / Home
screens.notes: AI suggestion card, quick generate button, streak counter, weekly volume bar chart, recent workouts list, upcoming schedule calendar, PR highlights, body metrics summary.

screens.name: Progress & History
screens.notes: 5 tabs: Overview, Workouts, Body, Records, Analytics. Volume chart, frequency heatmap, PR board, weight trend chart, measurement log table, muscle balance radar chart (Premium).

screens.name: Settings / Profile
screens.notes: Settings nav: Profile, Fitness, Preferences, Subscription, Notifications, Data. Profile form, unit toggle (kg/lbs), rest timer slider, subscription card, notification toggles.

screens.name: Pre-Built Programs Directory
screens.notes: Program directory. Search bar, filter sidebar, program cards with cover/name/trainer/duration/difficulty/price/rating. Category tabs.

screens.name: Program Detail / Flow
screens.notes: States: preview, active, week_view, completed. Program header, weekly schedule (accordion), progress bar, reviews list, trainer card sidebar.

screens.name: Social Feed
screens.notes: Feed with Following/Discover tabs. Post cards with avatar, text, workout summary, progress photo, likes, comments.

screens.name: User Profile (Public)
screens.notes: Public profile. Header with avatar/name/bio, stats grid, achievement badges grid, shared workouts list, follow/message buttons.
